title: Bounty Law
description: Whether you’re dead or alive… you’re just a dollar sign to bounty hunter, Jake Cahill.
quote: I’m looking at an ugly owl-hoot about to get his jaw busted.
parent: Once Upon a Time in Hollywood
altHero: Rick Dalton as Jake Cahill in a cowboy hat stands in front of a bulletin board with Wanted posters
alt1: Cahill stands with his hand on his gun holster
alt3: Cahill speaks to a man from atop a horse
alt4: Cahill casts a shadow on a man unconscious on the ground
